con:testCase.name: PAYCTDOMOUEXRTP_Neg
con:testCase.con:description:
Domestic Real Time External Payment Out negative scenario
PAYMENTTYPE: NRTP ISPC:PAYCTDOMOUEXRTP PAYMENT_CLASSIFICATION: Domestic ISEDITABLE:N

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_8" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_8" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v6" xmlns:urn3="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_6" xmlns:urn4="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_6"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAYS</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V1_8</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${#TestSuite#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${#TestSuite#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>BES</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${#TestSuite#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item1}" value="${#TestSuite#value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item2}" value="${#TestSuite#value2}"/> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item3}" value="${#TestSuite#value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority> <urn3:serviceLevel>NRTP</urn3:serviceLevel> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#debitAccount}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>6</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#debitBankBic}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>Smith</urn2:name> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#creditAccount}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> </urn1:transaction> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Cannot process the payment with these instructions

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns5:PaymentCreateResponse xmlns:ns10="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:nationalinformation-nor:v1_1" xmlns:ns9="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_6" xmlns:ns8="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentsearch:v1_7" xmlns:ns7="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:search:v1_7" xmlns:ns6="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" xmlns:ns5="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_8" xmlns:ns4="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_6" xmlns:ns3="urn:pays.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v6" xmlns:ns2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_8" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"> <ns3:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>6000</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <StrErrorCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <Message>Validation error</Message> <NativeError xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <errorItem key="6500" value="Cannot process the payment with these instructions"/> </ns3:ResponseState> </ns5:PaymentCreateResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
